title: Chicken parmo
description: Here’s an easy and delicious chicken parmigiana, a meaty variation on the classic Italian recipe. Make sure you put tomato sauce on the bottom – this way the chicken stays nice and moist.
ingredients: 4 chicken breasts, butterflied and slightly flattened
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 x 400g/14oz tin chopped tomatoes (or fresh equivalent)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
